channel.title: type on buybyte
channel.description: Recent content in type on buybyte

item.title: Master Type System
item.description: 为啥需要 type system? type 就是契约 At the hardware level, the machine does not know types in the way humans or high-level programming languages do. 硬件级别就是电信号了。type 这种概念不存在。 Bits are just bits (0s and 1s), and the CPU/memory has no intrinsic understanding of “integers,” “strings,”
